SampleResponse:
<rsp status="ok" call_id="72fe7bbe8df0">
  <method>create_recurring</method>
  <create_recurring status="true">
    <recurring_class_details>
      <class_master_id>51496</class_master_id>
      <class_id>56635</class_id>
      <is_recurring value="1">
        <recurring_summary><![CDATA[Your recurring series starts on 10/23/2013 at 05:00 and repeats daily (all 7 days)]]></recurring_summary>
      </is_recurring>
      <recording_url><![CDATA[http://live.wiziq.com/aliveext/Recorded.aspx?SessionCode=LOOQpa63MEg%3d]]></recording_url>
      <presenter_list>
        <presenter>
          <presenter_email><![CDATA[teacherinme@gmail.com]]></presenter_email>
          <presenter_url><![CDATA[http://live.wiziq.com/aliveext/LoginToSession.aspx?SessionCode=EN8hf9YERLg%3d]]></presenter_url>
        </presenter>
      </presenter_list>
    </recurring_class_details>
  </create_recurring>
</rsp>

    </teacher_details_list>

</rsp>
